Portal 2 is the one of the best games I have ever played.
I love the second one and the first one. I could easily agree that this is one of my favorite games. Its a fun puzzle game that is funny, unique, and very interesting. I've played the game over again over several years of time, and bought it on PC just to play it again, regardless of having a console copy. The point I am trying to get across is that it is 100% worth your money. Do not have any doubts about getting it if you can, it is such a fun game that I would hate for anyone to miss out on.

but most of all, it's beautiful.

Portal 2 is a great improvement over a game that is already amazing. The story, characters, and puzzles are all a lot more intriguing. 
I found the additional mechanics and more advanced puzzles to be highly welcome. 

This game is also on sale a lot, so you can get it for $2 pretty easily if you want it. 

9.2/10
Cool game
amazing game somehow retains replay value every time i come back to it, even after many completions of the campaign

I bought this game on the day of release and keep coming back to play through it again and again. Portal 1 was fantastic; Portal 2 is a masterpiece. The music is great, the writing is funny, the story has some twists, and the puzzles require thought. I really can't think of anything negative to say. There's even a completely separate set of puzzles and story for co-op.

After 8 years and almost 120k reviews this game still has an Overwhelmingly Positive rating and that is no surprise. If somehow you haven't played this you should buy it now.
